channel.title: Project Infinity(From scratcH)
channel.description:
[code]First of all, the hiyascape was fun but it now old so i decided to remake it with great features
i started this about a week ago useing blakescape it is a empty server with login and walking nothing else. No items no equipment and there wasnt even multiplayer so basicly i did everything myself
Spoilers would be nice on mopar btw -.- [code] UPDATES HERE [/code] [code] [size=18pt]Added full Hiyascape Training Added Multi zones, perfect 1v1 zones Added Real Veng Added the pk box Added pkpoints and rewards Added knifes[/size] [/code] Ignore the Battlescape Isle at bottom Right, i was creating a battlescape isle remake then decided to go to Hiyascape. The pictures were already uploaded so whatever ll :D Home [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo297/dds3030/Home.jpg[/img] Added Knifes [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo297/dds3030/Knifes.jpg[/img] Fixed Special Attacks on player and npc (correct runescape maxhit formula) [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo297/dds3030/Specials.jpg[/img] Custom Login Now says Welcome to Hiyascape(was creating a BSI remake) [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo297/dds3030/Login.jpg[/img] Shops Ignore the Battlescape Isle thing at bottom Right, i was makeing a battlescape isle remake but then thought about hiyascape. shops were in same place [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo297/dds3030/Shops.jpg[/img] [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo297/dds3030/Shops2.jpg[/img] Please tell me what you Think of this So Far[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 12:38:30 pm[/size][hr]Updated Pictures Correct NOW![/code]

@c_u_in_lumb wrote:

[code]First of all, the hiyascape was fun but it now old so i decided to remake it with great features

i started this about a week ago useing blakescape it is a empty server with login and walking nothing else.

No items no equipment and there wasnt even multiplayer so basicly i did everything myself

Spoilers would be nice on mopar btw -.-

 UPDATES HERE 
[size=18pt]Added full Hiyascape Training
Added Multi zones, perfect 1v1 zones
Added Real Veng
Added the pk box
Added pkpoints and rewards
Added knifes[/size]

Ignore the Battlescape Isle at bottom Right, i was creating a battlescape isle remake then decided to go to Hiyascape.

The pictures were already uploaded so whatever ll

Home

Custom Login

Now says Welcome to Hiyascape(was creating a BSI remake)

Shops
